reviewText:
This is exactly what we were searching for!  I purchased it for a 57 year old man with developmental delays.
One of his favorite things is trains and he loves watching train videos as well.  This provides hours of entertainment
for him.  Thank you!!
I bought this for my elderly father, who told me he can't understand a word since the narration is with a British accent.  Too bad since the visuals are very nice.
Steam and diesel from all over the world. Most footage is from the mid-90's, so some of these engine may no longer be operating. Get this.
